name: Markdown
semantic_context: Convert data between Markdown and HTML
natural_language_description: 这是 Markdown 节点。主要用于: Convert data between Markdown and HTML

mode.name: mode
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 默认值: htmlToMarkdown
available_options: Markdown to HTML (值: markdownToHtml) - Convert data from Markdown to HTML
HTML to Markdown (值: htmlToMarkdown) - Convert data from HTML to Markdown

html.name: html
html.description: The HTML to be converted to markdown
html.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTML | 作用: The HTML to be converted to markdown | (必填项)

markdown.name: markdown
markdown.description: The Markdown to be converted to html
markdown.natural_language_description: 参数名: Markdown | 作用: The Markdown to be converted to html | (必填项)

destinationKey.name: destinationKey
destinationKey.description: The field to put the output in. Specify nested fields using dots, e.g."level1.level2.newKey".
destinationKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Destination Key | 作用: The field to put the output in. Specify nested fields using dots, e.g."level1.level2.newKey". | 默认值: data | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: openLinksInNewWindow (值: None) - Whether to open all links in new windows (by adding the attribute target="_blank" to  tags)
simplifiedAutoLink (值: None) - Whether to enable automatic linking to URLs
backslashEscapesHTMLTags (值: None) - Whether to support for HTML Tag escaping ex: <div>foo</div>
completeHTMLDocument (值: None) - Whether to output a complete html document, including <html>, <head> and <body> tags instead of an HTML fragment
customizedHeaderId (值: None) - Whether to use text in curly braces as header ID
emoji (值: None) - Whether to enable emoji support. Ex: this is a :smile: emoji For more info on available emojis, see https://github.com/showdownjs/showdown/wiki/Emojis.
encodeEmails (值: None) - Whether to enable e-mail addresses encoding through the use of Character Entities, transforming ASCII e-mail addresses into its equivalent decimal entities

excludeTrailingPunctuationFromURLs (值: None) - Whether to exclude trailing punctuation from autolinking URLs. Punctuation excluded: . ! ? ( ). Only applies if simplifiedAutoLink option is set to true.
ghCodeBlocks (值: None) - Whether to enable support for GFM code block style
ghCompatibleHeaderId (值: None) - Whether to generate header IDs compatible with github style (spaces are replaced with dashes and a bunch of non alphanumeric chars are removed)
ghMentionsLink (值: None) - Whether to change the link generated by @mentions. Showdown will replace {u} with the username. Only applies if ghMentions option is enabled.
ghMentions (值: None) - Whether to enable github @mentions, which link to the username mentioned
tasklists (值: None) - Whether to enable support for GFM tasklists
headerLevelStart (值: None) - Whether to set the header starting level
requireSpaceBeforeHeadingText (值: None) - Whether to make adding a space between # and the header text mandatory
literalMidWordAsterisks (值: None) - Whether to stop showdown from interpreting asterisks in the middle of words as  and  and instead treat them as literal asterisks
literalMidWordUnderscores (值: None) - Whether to stop showdown from interpreting underscores in the middle of words as  and  and instead treat them as literal underscores
noHeaderId (值: None) - Whether to disable the automatic generation of header IDs
parseImgDimensions (值: None) - Whether to enable support for setting image dimensions from within markdown syntax
prefixHeaderId (值: None) - Add a prefix to the generated header IDs
rawHeaderId (值: None) - Whether to remove only spaces, ' and " from generated header IDs (including prefixes), replacing them with dashes (-)
rawPrefixHeaderId (值: None) - Whether to prevent showdown from modifying the prefix
simpleLineBreaks (值: None) - Whether to parse line breaks as <br>, like GitHub does, without needing 2 spaces at the end of the line
smartIndentationFix (值: None) - Whether to try to smartly fix indentation problems related to es6 template strings in the midst of indented code

disableForced4SpacesIndentedSublists (值: None) - Whether to disable the requirement of indenting sublists by 4 spaces for them to be nested, effectively reverting to the old behavior where 2 or 3 spaces were enough
splitAdjacentBlockquotes (值: None) - Whether to split adjacent blockquote blocks
strikethrough (值: None) - Whether to enable support for strikethrough syntax
tablesHeaderId (值: None) - Whether to add an ID property to table headers tags
tables (值: None) - Whether to enable support for tables syntax
